title: A Telerehabilitation System for the Selection, Evaluation and Remote Management of Therapies. (arXiv:2401.08721v1 [cs.HC])
abstract: Telerehabilitation systems that support physical therapy sessions anywhere can help save healthcare costs while also improving the quality of life of the users that need rehabilitation. The main contribution of this paper is to present, as a whole, all the features supported by the innovative Kinect-based Telerehabilitation System (KiReS). In addition to the functionalities provided by current systems, it handles two new ones that could be incorporated into them, in order to give a step forward towards a new generation of telerehabilitation systems. The knowledge extraction functionality handles knowledge about the physical therapy record of patients and treatment protocols described in an ontology, named TRHONT, to select the adequate exercises for the rehabilitation of patients. The teleimmersion functionality provides a convenient, effective and user-friendly experience when performing the telerehabilitation, through a two-way real-time multimedia communication. translated_title: 一个用于选择、评估和远程管理治疗的远程康复系统
translated_abstract: 支持物理疗法在任何地方进行的远程康复系统可以帮助节省医疗费用，同时改善需要康复的用户的生活质量。本文的主要贡献是作为一个整体呈现创新的基于Kinect的远程康复系统（KiReS）所支持的所有功能。除了当前系统提供的功能外，它还处理了两个新功能，可以将其纳入其中，以便向新一代远程康复系统迈进。知识提取功能处理有关患者物理疗法记录和在名为TRHONT的本体中描述的治疗方案的知识，以选择适当的康复训练。远程沉浸功能通过双向实时多媒体通信，在进行远程康复时提供方便、有效和用户友好的体验。本本体包含了因康复系统而要求的知识。
tldr: 本文介绍了一个创新的基于Kinect的远程康复系统，它具有知识提取功能和远程沉浸功能，可实现对患者的康复训练的选择、评估和远程管理。
en_tdlr: This paper presents an innovative Kinect-based telerehabilitation system that incorporates knowledge extraction and teleimmersion functionalities, enabling selection, evaluation, and remote management of patient rehabilitation therapy.
